DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect total intravenous anesthesia ( TIVA ; propofol , remifentanil ) balance anesthesia ( BAL ; induction propofol fentanyl ; maintenance anesthesia sevoflurane nitrous oxide ) pulmonary function 30 minute emergence general anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Total Intravenous Anesthesia Balanced Anesthesia Postoperative Lung Function
DOC.criteria: ASA 12 BMI normal lung disease Nicotine abuse
